quotes.quote: Longevity in this business is about being able to reinvent yourself or invent the future.
Longevity is the key to success.
To achieve longevity you will have cycles. No one gets there in one straight shot.
A long life is a life well spent.
How do you live a long life? Take a two mile walk every morning before breakfast.
There can be a lot of longevity in the repetition of things being told again and again in a variety of ways.
It's a real roller-coaster ride if you're lucky to have longevity in this business you have to be able to ride those waves.
A long life may not be good enough, but a good life is long enough.
A sense of humor has been linked with longevity. It is a possibility that the mental attitude reflected in a lively sense of humor is an important factor predisposing some people toward long life.
The key to excellent health and longevity is to eat a high ratio of micronutrients to macronutrients.
The secret of long life is double careers. One to about age sixty, then another for the next thirty years.
Mere longevity is a good thing for those who watch Life from the side lines. For those who play the game, an hour may be a year, a single day's work an achievement for eternity.
The secret to longevity is to keep breathing.
There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
Being professional is just really clearly the way to go and helps you on the road to longevity.
Long life is a burden, when it's spent in misery.
The man who has lived the longest is not he who has spent the greatest number of years, but he who has had the greatest sensibility of life.
There's a long life ahead of you and it's going to be beautiful, as long as you keep loving and hugging each other.
Long life will sometimes obscure the star of fame.
Every single person is a beautiful human being, and we're lucky. That's what gives you longevity. You have to love the people that you work with.
The longevity of success depends on how well you manage your breakthroughs.

A human being would certainly not grow to be seventy or eighty years old if this longevity had no meaning for the species. The afternoon of human life must also have a significance of its own and cannot be merely a pitiful appendage to life's morning.
All of us can expect to live longer than any organization that we would work for. That continues apace. Human longevity is increasing; corporate longevity is decreasing.
Longevity uncommon extension of the fear of death.
If you want to live a long life, focus on making contributions.
The key to longevity is to learn every aspect of music that you can.
Positive people have more friends which is a key factor of happiness and longevity.
Longevity is a big part of credibility.
Those who die without being forgotten get longevity.
The secret to a long life is to stay busy, get plenty of exercise and don't drink too much. Then again, don't drink too little.
